abstract: Holland Cotter reviews solo show of mixed-media works by the artist who goes by the name MPA at Leo Koenig Inc gallery.
snippet: An enigmatic solo by the young artist who goes by the name MPA mixes mediums and forms.
lead_paragraph: An enigmatic solo by the young artist who goes by the name MPA mixes mediums and forms.

headline.main: MPA: ‘Directing Light onto Fist of Father’
headline.print_headline: MPA: ‘Directing Light onto Fist of Father’
headline.seo: MPA: ‘Directing Light onto Fist of Father’
